content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work got off highway 94 and on to highway 29 near chippewa falls, wi.  about 1/4 of a mile on to highway 29 off to my left was a massive blue flash of light.  i would say it was probably a mile or two away from me to the east.  imagine a gigantic camera flash only 100,000 times more intense and blue.  it was extremely bright low to the ground and there was like a blue aura higher in the air.  i would say the width of the flash was about 300 feet and the height of the flash was close to 200-300 feet possibly higher.  i honestly have never seen anything like this in my life and i can't even tell you what in the hell it was.  the second i saw it my head jerked and my heart was racing, i literally said out loud what in the f***?  i felt scared...I called the county sheriff department and then when i got home i hopped on google and typed in massive blue flash.  the reason why i came here is apparently this has happened elsewhere according to the internet.  the question is what the heck was it?  there is no way, absolutely no way at all that was a transformer blowing or anything.  this was huge!  the weather was clear.  looking forward to answers.
content.summary: Massive blue flash

content.detailedDescription:
Point of view: 47���25'xx n / 9���22'xx e facing southwest
observing conditions: hazy, partialy clear
ufo characteristics: 2 orange-white constantly glowing lights
ufo trail: coming from north/nortwest flying towards south/southeast turning southwest and vanishing in the haze.
duration of observation: approx. 5 seconds

i (30, academic) was taking a smoke together with my gf (28, academic) on my balcony. we were stargazing. my gf explained to me the orion constellation, with its belt and sword. we were trying to figure out which stars belong to this constellation. i tend to look at the night sky while i smoke, hoping to see shooting stars or satellites. both i've seen plenty.

when looking at the belt of orion i noticed a rapid movement to the far right. i thought of a shooting star and immediately pulled the attention of my gf to it, so she could see the shooting star too. it was no shooting star. the phenomenon consisted of two orange-white lights in far distance from us at a vertical viewing angle of about 35��� to 40���. the lights were constantly glowing. they moved horizontally at constant height at a speed much faster than conventional airplanes - which i saw plenty of before and after the incident this evening. it was flying at about 2/3 of the speed of a regular shooting star.

the object(s) passed below the belt of orion, and when it just passed below the next brightest star to the left it appeared to slow down and it turned right (from the objects perspective). the appearance of the object slowing down was probably just a visual effect of it turning away from us. the original flightpath was from our right to our left, so when it turned southwest it looked like it would slow down or even reverse its direction. this cognition only lasted for just a moment. then it vanished behind the haze at the horizon.

when the object(s) turned, the angle between the lights changed and their distance to each other shrinked. if one would imagine the lights belonging to the same object, then it would have tipped to its right. also just a moment before it disappeared i thought to see blurry lights between the obvious big lights. but the moment was so short i cannot make this claim without doubt.

the past days i've read various reports where people say they were scared - why one would get scared is beyond my comprehension. me and my gf were happy to witness the phenomenon, we went into party mode after the incident. although she would never call it a "phenomenon". it's clear to her that she saw one solid object, an ufo, sharply turning its direction. i'm however not of the kind to jump to conclusions easily. to me, there is no way to tell whether this was one solid object or two flying objects in formation. if it was just one object, it must have been massive in size, because of the distance to us. since the incident i'm trying to find out what this phenomenon could have been.

i ruled out several common explanations. due to its rapid movement it could not be a plane. due its size, even if i think of it as two objects, it could not be a regular satellite. also, it was no meteorite, fireball or shooting star. it had no tail and did not leave a trail and maintained height. however, i've never seen the iss, so i don't know if the iss together with a supply ship would look just like that. i checked the iss sighting opportunities for the date and time, the incident does not coincide. there was no sighting opportunity for saint gallen (switzerland) for the 24th of march 2011 and also all sighting opportunites this month seem to be early in the morning. the incident happened at 20:08. however, maybe i'm making a mistake and i would be happy if someone with experience in acquiring data on the iss orbit could verify this. also i couldn't find any information on a docking maneuver of a supply ship at this date. to make it short: if this was not the iss then i'm out of options.

i'm completely non-esoteric and non-religious. i was always open to the possibility of the existance of ufos. however the prevalent lack of the most fundamental commonsense among alleged witnesses has led me to insist that i could only be convinced if i observed an ufo myself. unfortunately the incident was not impressive enough to entirely remove all doubt. too bad the object didn't do any funky movements - at least it was fast and changed its direction slightly. i could not have recorded the phenomenon, because there was not enough time and i doubt my equipment would have been sufficient to pick up anything but darkness.

i would be happy if someone could check the "iss"-hypothesis and contact me at ck.Inofficial@gmail.Com. also if someone has another possible explanation i would like to know about it. i can provide more details on the incident if necessary, but i think i covered the observed's essence. of course i would remain anonymous in the process.

kind regards
content.summary: Two fast moving orange lights

content.detailedDescription: Was trying to identify a satellite using an application on my phone and notices a shadowy object moving from north to south.  it was dark, but appeared to reflect light on the leading edge of the object.  it was either really low and moved really slowly, or it was extremely large and moving very fast at a high altitude. it appeared to be very thin since as soon as it never blocked any visible stars.  i tried to show a friend and he did not see it.  i questioned what i saw, thinking it may be a large flock of birds flying in formation, but there was no variation to the shape.
content.summary: Large dark object moved smoothly and silently.  only saw what appeared to be the leading edge of the object.

content.detailedDescription: Bright light similar to that of a television in the dark.  shooting across the sky while my husband was grilling outside.  saw this bright light looked up in awe stood their for a moment and then ran in the house.  came back out and their was a streak (trail) in the sky where the it looks like the sky split between the flying object.  tried taking pictures but it was too dark, could not get a good image.
content.summary: Bright light shooting across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was homeless, about 2am. eating food inside a dumpster behind a grocery store on a clear night . 20 to 30 minutes while eating a presence came on me that something was about to happen , suddenly above my head and around me these giant ball-like glowing white spheres were appearing for a second (like a camera flash) each one would make this loud boom sound noise as they appeared then disappeared . it was so loud i could feel the vibrations off each sphere as each one would appear thin disappear. i got out the dumpster from being scared. then suddenly it all stopped .  still shocked what just happened i climbed back in the dumpster to begin to eat.  then it happened again, so i got out then the event  stopped .    this happened a few more times . then i figured whatever those spheres where , they were warning me or they didn't want me eating bad food inside that dumpster ,so i left . i couldn't figure out if they were angels , aliens in these sphere's , or people from area 51 controlling those sphere's. but whatever it was , they were trying to protect me from probably eating something bad that night . boy, what a memorable experience. what was that? i wish someone could tell me to this day. what an incredible experience.
content.summary: Jacksonville bright energy balls blueish-white big about 300 of them in a clutter appearing went away making a boom sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was going out with my family, and we were in the beach, walking, then i looked to the sea, and a light just apper from nowhere and go left to right and then disapear, another do the same after the first one disapear, but above the first, a third came at the same place the first appered, and the last on, on the place of the second,but the last don disapear like the others, it started to go up and go behind a mountain.
my first thinking is: a normal ship using some kind of fireworks, but there was no ship, and in s���o vicente is a passage of ships, and you can still seeing them(the ships) at any time of the day, then i though, it was airplanes or helicopters, but it was to fast and airplanes dont appears from nowhere and disapear.I don't know what i felt, think i was happy and surprise(my first ufo view =d)
content.summary: 4 faster and unusual lights

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were on the front porch, smoking a cigarette and watching lightning hit two communications towers that we can easily see from the front porch. as i looked toward the one on the left, i saw a light that was moving rapidly from left to right...There was no blinking lights on it at all, and living somewhat close to an airport and seeing a lot of air traffic, none that i have seen have moved like that. it showed no erratic movement, just steady and fast. we at first thought it was an airplane until we noticed no blinking lights, and there was absolutely no noise associated with it. (again, very strange, because you can hear every plane that travels overhead here.) i asked *(name deleted--cms/sg) if she knew what that was, and she said no...I was overly excited, because having seen things before, i have never seen one this close...We lost sight of it as it very quickly disappeared out of our view. i could not tell what kind of craft it was, and i tried to see it better with the lightning, but to no avail. it just appeared to be a very large spherical white light.
content.summary: Holiday

content.detailedDescription: Bright blueish-purple glowing ball of light,coin sized appears to me thin vanishes while i'm in my room . many times happened before.
content.summary: Jacksonville

content.detailedDescription: I can't be sure of the date,however this is what happend. my wife & i were visiting my parents in logan,ohio.I believe it was in the spring because it was a warm,moonless night. i don't remember seeing any stars either, so it must have been overcast. anyway, we were standing outside the back door with no outside lights on. my dad saw it first and said "'wonder what the hell that is?" we all looked toward town,which is a mile & a half due south of the house and saw a white light in the sky.We couldn't judge the altitude of the object,or the distance,but we noticed it was moving in our direction. the power line runs over our property directly from town,south to north and the object seemed to be following that exact path. as it got a bit closer we could see it was 2 lights,or seemed to be. as it got even closer we saw it was actually 4 square lights arranged in a square pattern. it made absolutely no sound throughout this time. as it glided over the house, we just stared.As i said before,without points of reference we couldn't judge its size but it filled the space between the trees behind the house & the ones across the road. we could not make out a shape the lights were mounted on. as the thing disappered past the house we just stared at each other. we never saw it "zoom away" or anything because we were kind of rooted in our tracks.(not paralized or anything, just shocked) as we started to speculate what the thing could have been, we heard 2 black helicopters just haulin' ass right over the house at treetop level! it couldn't have been a minute or two after we saw the lights,and these'copters were l-o-u-d! so they had to be military. they had to be running on infrared because they showed no lights whatsoever. i know this because they went right over the house! we thought they were going to hit the house or the trees! anyway,we never saw anything in the papers or heard anyone talking about it,so we let it go.
content.summary: 4 square shaped white lights arranged in a square pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
*(wit's name, email and phone number removed--cms/sg).
disclosure


     i've got to tell you that i'm sceptical about much of the world and the information we receive from or about it.  but from time to time something happens that, even if unexplainable seems to be undeniable.  i have experienced just such a series of the unexplainable, maybe you can help me with this ongoing series of incidences and the evidence i bear from them.  i now even doubt what is in my left wrist but it is there.  for some reason i have gleaned that it may be a tag - tracking device.  maybe you can help and we can learn together.
     twelve years ago i was working on a fellow film students post graduation first project designed as a portfolio builder.  durring the production i men a man who i became friends with, not only because of our film aspirations but we had much more in common.  more than we knew at the start. 
     after the productioin was finished we continued to pursue friendship.  i therefore invited him over to my house to not only show some of a mutual hobby but to share a meal over the "barbi'.  as we sat in the summer sun enjoying the meal the conversatioin turned to me telling of one of my script ideas.  it was based on a fictional "alien abduction"  from the "alien" pov.  during my telling "lenn"  the outline he stoped me and started with a story of his own, one he apparantly believed in.
     he pointed at a bump on a meridian of the left ankle.  as he told me his theory about it and how it felt and what it was i was chilled to the bone as i quietly listened...Not an easy thing for me as i like to engage very much.  but there was so much more,  i had an identical bump in the exact same spot of the left ankle.  the symptoms and feelings in it were identical to his.  he stated profoundly in his belief that he had been abducted and had received an implant.  he liked it and he still has it to this day.
     i however felt extremely violated and wanted it gone.  but before i continue on what came next let me describe this "tag" in me.  i had discovered the bump on my left ankleat about two inches above the joint several years before.  i, at that time felt that i had cought a sliver and felt a hard lump inside.  so i was determined to remove it with a very sharp pair of jewers tweezers.  it had never festered so having previous experience with metal slivers, that is how i approached my attempt to remove it.
     but the moment i tried to open the bump to extract it i was struck with intense and very sharp pain.  never in the removal of other metalic ar wood sliver had i ever felt somethng like it.  and unusually the pain did not subside for three days.  i mad a few more attempts all to the same result.  i stoped trying and decided thare was no harm as when left alone, it never bothered me.  that was until my conversation with lenn.
     so i wanted it out even more and since i knew someone who claimed to study the subject much more than myself i approached this person and recanted my story.  he wanted to see it and became very exited upon seing the bump.  he knew another who he claimed was more of an "expert" on the subject and asked if i would meet and discuss further the item and offered just the option i had hoped for, the removal of the item.  i agreed and a meeting was arranged.
     the meeting was set for the folowing saturday, six days later.   so i woke up and went to the meeting.  the story was once again told to eager ears.  i was asked to display the bump, when i pulled down my sock, to my shock and their dissapointment it was gone.  what remained could be described as a cleanly removed top half of the bump but there was what reminded me of the calous left behind from metal slivers which had a shape like an arrowhead.  exploring by hand revealed nothing left any deeper. it was gone, whatever it had been in there.
     my new acquantancee told me that this was common.  both were very disapointed.  i rushed over to lenn's house and showed him.  very weird! 
     i did not loose interest though and retold the story frome time to time over the years.  strang thing though...I met even more people with the same or similar "objects" in the same or different locations.  speculations abounded.  through the conversations i started figuring that 6these were placed on acapuncture meridians.  i've had treatments and studied on it a bit.  then it evolved in my mind that this object undiferentiated the local tissue and formed a ganglia about itself, hence the extreme pain when probed or messed with.  just a theory.
     when i tried to write this story once i stored it to a floppy, the next morning the disc was blanked.  i made several more such failed attempts.  then, as i am an experienced professional photographer i decided to try an experiment, i shoved it ind an x-ray packet used for safekeeping film through airport machines.  that worked and the copy was "safe".  it's still around here somewhere.
     but the story continues....
     four years ago i discovered a new bump on the inside of my left wrist.  no memories on how i could have received such an injury to the even more sensitive area of the wrist.  it was the same though in all ways to the previus "tag".   i want it gone!  but there is even more to this story.
     on april the twenty second of two thousand and nine,  ten - twenty p.M. i witnessed an usual object pass directly over my house.  it was at about twelve hundred feet because it was under a lite scattering of small puffy clouds that still allowed viewing the stars and constelations.  as it approached over the local small town of junction city  oregon it appeared to be strange.  the city lights weren't quite able fo catch a real reflection off it.  as it left the lights it became totaly black.  as it approached i shook my head as looking away as i asked myself if it was real.
     i am a lifetime member of the astronomical society and know the sky.  it blocked the clouds and stars.  so it revealed to me it's oultine, a huge triangle slightly indented at its apparent rear end.  so i held up my hands and bracketed it,  it was big enough that if i tried to hold a basketball that i couldn't have...Maybe a larger ball though.  as it passed over i heard nothing, observed no change in its slow pace or course.  stranger still...The bump on my wrist seemed to tingle.  the object left due west and the entire viewing was approximately two minutes.
     later as i tried to estimate conventional jets that passed over i guestimated the triangle must have been about five hundred feet wide by three hundred feet long.  but back to the "tag" in my wrist.   last year i was working on a sheetrock project with a bro and scraped it very roughly.  it scabed over and as it healed, it left an outline similar to the calous on my ankle.  but it is still there and still visible.  i would so like someone to take a serious look at it.  when going into a surgery through the v.A. last year the radiologist who was sweeping me for any potentialy dangerous metals in my body could find nothing.  maybe it is silicon based.  what do you think?   i invite contact and further discussion.
content.summary: This is more about a tag on my left wrist

content.detailedDescription:
Receive sms true my phone i have cousin in suriname now for 9 month.

i have receive too message in two weeks time that he saw ufo strange light he could not take film of it because he borrow his camera to a friend.


first time his neighbor man ask him if that was and airplane and he say no because of the strange ligh. the neighbor man told my soucin that previous monht he saw it also.


now one week later my grand mother past a way my relatif went to suriname.

content.detailedDescription:
Guess what- i was coming from market and was eating ice-cream and as soon i look up at sky- high there was something shining- first with led rights..And then that body divided in two parts and started giving white lights. i bet check on the news tomorrow..It was un-identified flying object...Ufo...Another life exist in this universe this claim is enough to support that... whooooo am luckier one..
i tried to call up police but network failure showed up and did not dialed up...Time was i guess around 9:30 pm [india timings]...There were tooo much stars so i could not keep track on it for long time...
that was not plane, helicopter or satellite ..That was something else...I can love aliens instead of humans.. ha ha..Its so fascinating...Come on news channels and nasa pick up the matter
content.summary: Jalandhar ,punjab

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home along i5- from paradise ca... during storm... looked up in sky and was noticing a bright orb in the clouds. it was during the supermoon. it was basically motionless. i captured it on video and it seemed to drop a sparkly object into the clouds.
content.summary: Red orb in clouds

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to walk my dog and i saw a yellow eggshaped flame coming towards me. i thought it was the sun coming down onto the earth. then i became blinded by an extremely bright yellow flash , almost like a camera. i began feeling a hyper sensation. my dog began barking and he ran away, but i couldn't chase after him because i felt frozen. when it finally went away i could move again. i went inside it was already three in the morning , even though it only felt as though it lasted several seconds. ever since that day i've had very dry eyes and have had to keep reappplying eyedrops every hour to moisten them.  it was the scariest most disturbing event of my life !!!!
content.summary: Very scary and disturbing !!!

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were on holiday in bali, it was our last night and we were hanging outside by the pool just looking at the sky and talking. all of a sudden one of my friends quickly jumped up and pointed to the nw region of the sky just below the moon and said in excitement "is that a plane or a ufo?" by the time i jumped up and looked, the object was more overhead and straight away i knew it was definitely not a plane. it was moving quite fast through the sky, for the height that it was flying. 

as we watched we were surprised to hear no sound emitted from this object, now we can call it a craft because it was being controlled by some sort of intelligence. as it passed directly over head (moving from nw to se making a slight turn more to the east) we could see the underbelly of the traingular craft, there were three main lights on the points of the triangle and about 20 lights in the centre pulsating around like a carousel, one of the lights (pretty certain it was the front one) was red. 

this was an extremely exciting feeling to see something like this, all three of us were standing there with our jaws on the floor in amazement, afterwards we couldnt shake the shocked feeling, i had a lot of trouble sleeping that night, not because i was scared but just out of sheer adrenalin. a couple of things to point out with this as well, it happened on the night of a thunderstorm, the craft came from a patch of sky where there was a lot of lightning, and where it flew to, there was more lightning. this could just be a coincidence, but it was quite weird to see.

when my friend first saw the craft he thought it was more of a diamond shape, but when it passed over head it appeared more triangular. it was moving way too fast for me to run inside and get my camera, which is frustrating, especially telling the event to skeptics. after this happened we stood outside for a while, recounting the event and watched two jetliners fly overhead, just to confirm that what we saw was not a commercial airliner. three main factors that were the big standouts are 1. no noise 2. extremely fast 3. oscillating light patterns.

from the time we saw it, to the time it flew out of sight it covered the sky in about 20-30 seconds. it entered our sight at 315 degrees nw (trusty old iphone compass)

thank you for having such a great website where regular people can openly discuss their experiences with out the fear of being ridiculed.
content.summary: Triangle, three main lights, oscillating lights underneath, no sounds, fast

content.detailedDescription:
Nasa released 10 km mothership in photos by accident in apollo archives

when looking over the apollo 15 panoramic images, i came across a photo that has a mothership in it. its not a cloud. clouds do not exist on the moon. so i enlarged the photo and saw that not only was it a ship, it looked a lot like the star ship voyager from star trek. 
 
now this ship sits inside the edge of waterman crater, very close to tsiolkovskiy crater. tsiolkovskiy crater is 185 km across long ways and about 160 across the short ways. waterman is unknown. 15 of these ships would fit across the tsiolkovskiy crater the short ways, therefore the mothership is just under 10.6 km in length. 

waterman crater is located on the moons far side and cannot be viewed directly from earth. 

now if you google the apollo missions you will see that due to lack of money nasa cancelled the missions 18-20. i have to ask you, what do you think nasa would do if they discovered a 10.6 km long alien vessel parked on the lunar surface on the far side of the moon? yeah, they would set up a retrieval mission or at the least explore the interior for technology that they could take home.

please don't take my word for it, instead look at the nasa link i put below. copy the photo to your computer and enlarge it, looking at the far left side. 

*(info placed in additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Nasa released 10 km mothership in photos by accident in apollo archives

content.detailedDescription:
I decided that i wanted to stand at my bedroom window and look at the stars.  

it was weird because i never stand and look outside my window at the stars.  but i felt like it and i wanted to see a ufo, and i did!

all of a sudden i saw a red and white strobe light type object move quickly across the sky.  the lights seemed to be right next to each other- maybe one on top of the other and they would blink one at a time very quickly- red, white, red, white, etc. it moved from the east to the west (mesa to tempe onwards toward phoenix) 

i have seen this twice before (but didn't report it till now)

i felt excited and my heart was racing. i was kind of perplexed because i wanted to see one, looked outside and i saw one...It all happened so perfectly!

while i was watching it i wanted it to slow down so i could see more detail-but it didn't.

after the sighting i felt calm- since i've seen this before. and i decided to look on the internet to see if anyone else had reported it.  since i didn't see anything, i decided to report it myself.

i lost sight of the object when i couldn't see out the right side of my window anymore.
content.summary: Bright red and white flashing object

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting watching tv and i looked out the window and saw a star-like light that was too bright to be just a star. i immediately went outside to look at it better and while i was staring at it the light seemed to change colors, like through a prism. the light was in no order but i remember red, green, yellow-ish white, and yellow. i live near an airport and i know the colors the lights are on the planes and i know what they look like. after a while staring at it i went to get my phone to get a picture but there was too much light pollution from the church next door to see it in the phone image. i stood there staring at it and it didn't seem to be moving then it looked further away, the light had become smaller to my vision, and it went right to left and up then down then back to the original position. my dad came out and said it was a plane up high but planes don't move like that, well they don't move that fast if they're that far away. i lost sight of it by coming in here to submit this.
content.summary: Light brighter than star moved oddly

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my back yard in surprise arizona waiting for my dog to do her business before coming in and going to bed. i caught a bright light out of my peripheral vision to my right side so i turned and saw an extremely large and bright light. the object swayed from side to side and went up and down slowly. it was hovering very slowly as it did these maneuvers. the light began to fade and it moved away. as it did so fighters from luke afb followed it until all aircraft went out of my line of sight. 

i have seen demonstrations of both the f22 and f35 fly. neither can do what this craft did. i would be very interested to see if anyone else in my area saw the same thing i did.
content.summary: Bright light that faded and fighter jets looked to follow it

content.detailedDescription: Riding the bus into work this morning, i was listening to the radio,.     headphones on, eyes closed. we were on the ross island bridge traveling west when i suddenly thought to open my eyes and look out over the willamette river and check out the portland skyline. it was about 6:45 a.M. and dawn was rapidly becoming full morning. what i immediately beheld was a cluster of bright lights over the river at ahout the same elevation as the bridge i was on,  there were three bright white lights that seemed to flicker or flash rapidly, all very  close together, and to their left was a lively little cluster of bright colored lights that blinked and seemed to tumble around each other.  the whole group of lights hung in the air as i craned my neck around to keep them in sight as long as possible. this object was maybe a quarter of a mile away. about 15 seconds passed before the bus drove over the bridge and into the city innards. i discerned no identifiable shape and have no idea what it was. sure would like to know if anybody else saw what i saw this morning. i've been watching the skies the last few months, especially since i viewed some youtube videos of ufos taken right here in portland, just north of where i was, along the east side of the willamette. sometimes i shout st the heavens, urging the mystery to reveal itself.  maybe i was heard.
content.summary: Portland  bright cluster of  white lights accompanied  by a  group of smaller but also very bright lights

content.detailedDescription: Simply amazing....Words cannot describe what is in the footage.
content.summary: Alien part 2

content.detailedDescription: Simply amazing....Words cannot describe what is in the footage.
content.summary: Alien entity shapeshifting in lunar crater

content.detailedDescription: I took a few photos in the backyard at my home. this is one of the starngest objects i have ever seen. there is no way to describe it other than alien..You can be the judge. i have other pic's with some video..Any help in figureing what this is would be appreciated. all my pic's and video are of odd objects. i try to follow these ufo's on video mode but it is very hard to keep up with them. the skys near my home are busy with all non terestrial objects. these objects literally scare the hell out of me. help me get the word out. i tried contacting my local news but no reply..They dont have a damn clue what they are missing. i have seen different shapes all very real
content.summary: Weird spider or crab like

content.detailedDescription:
Ingles (l&h power translator pro)


in the morning of november 12, 2006, my sister and his/her boyfriend they were inside of a train, when my sister's boyfriend observed a pontinho in the sky moving, as the train it was in movement gave for my sister to only remove 3 (three) pictures until that the train that was making a curve faiths with that of that more to see the object. at first it seemed only a point moving in the sky, but when they saw the picture with zoom is that he/she appeared the object.  
  
obs.: more or less about 6 (six) months approximately after they take the picture, they ordered the pictures for you, but they didn't have answer.  
  
if posivel compare the pictures with the ones that you have in file, to mine to see pictures of similar objects exists in their files. even more.  
  
*(wit's name removed--cms/sg).

portugu���s (brasil)

na manh��� do dia 12 de novembro de 2006, minha irm��� e seu namorado estavam  dentro de um trem, quando o namorado de minha irm��� observou um pontinho no c���u se movendo, como o trem estava em movimento deu para minha irm��� tirar apenas 3 ( tres) fotos at��� que o trem que estava fazendo uma curva fes com que n���o desse mais para ver o objeto. a princ���pio parecia so um ponto se movendo no c���u, mas quando viram a foto com zoom ��� que apareceu o objeto.  
  
obs.: mais ou menos uns 6 (seis) meses aproximadamente depois de tirarem a foto, eles mandaram as fotos para voc���s, mas n���o tiveram resposta.  
  
se posivel comparem as fotos com as que voces tem em arquivo, ao meu ver existem fotos de objetos parecidos em seus arquivos. at��� mais.  
  
*(wit's name removed--cms/sg).
content.summary: Parecia uma alcachofra gigante
content.locationName: São Bernardo do Campo, São Paulo

content.detailedDescription: I was inside the house when i heard the dogs barking. i went out side to see what was going on. i looked up in the sky and noticed the moon. the moon was 3/4 full and bright. it was then i saw the object. as i was veiwing it the object turned. at this point i could see that it was not a airplane. i went back inside and got my camera. i took 10 pictures of the object as it was moving up and down in a rapid motion as it moved off. i went back inside draw a sketch of the object.
content.summary: It was shaped like a string aray. object had green lights on the front.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were outside in my farm field on new year eve night. at midnight we went outside to shoot off our shotgun and my brother shot and about two seconds after he shot he said come and look and i saw two red lights moving in the distance they were moving together and pretty low. it seemed to be about four hundred feet from us, then i took the gun and said i will shoot at that star and as soon as i shot these lights appeared again exactly where i shot, they seemed to react to our shooting. what i think is there was a craft sitting there and we did not see it even though we were shooting at it unknowingly. this area is a crossroads for sightings we have seen dozens of crafts over the last several years.Two weeks ago we saw two objects flying overhead they were two yellow objects glowing and moving together with each other. most of these sightings are later on in the evening and also seen several stars that seemed to be quite bright and were flashing and then all of a sudden they were moving off across the sky. you could tell they were much closer than regular stars. also my brother was out one night and saw a flashing object and had a multi colored flashlight with him and he started flashing his light at the object and it flew over to where he was standing. that scared him pretty bag and now when we see these objects he will not do that any more especially if he is by himself. just a few lines to let people know there is all kinds of stuff out there.
.
content.summary: 2 red lights.

content.detailedDescription: At 11:05pm monday night march 28,2011 i stepped out to my backyard located on palos verdes penninsula, los angeles county, southern ca, to get some fresh air and was just stargazing looking upward in the sky in the southeast direction, when at the corner of my right eye, 10 minutes later at 11:15pm, i saw some movement at about 280 degrees. it looks like it had just flown over the ocean and now going over the area i was at. it looked like it came in at a wnw direction from a higher altitude gradually descending to a more west direction as it looked as it was passing by around my street or maybe a couple of streets to the west, towards los angeles. when first seeing this unknown object i thought they were 3 white birds, but when i focused my eyes it was way to bright to be birds but now realized they were 3 bright white lights almost flourescent. i also noticed the lights were at a fixed place while descending and turning the curve towards west-nw to los angeles, it did not act like any kinds of birds! while flying closet over my sighting i noticed the relection from the ground lights casted a shadow over the lights which i clearly saw a perfect black  triangle, outlining the lights.  they were located only on the bottom of the craft. it was going really fast but not shaking, it was more like a very fast and smooth, curved down the way it flew, nothing like any jet or conventional aircraft would fly like. i noticed ther was no sound, emitting from it , and remember this is at night when things are down, in a very quiet neighborhood. i was almost in shock when i saw it and when it flew by, my sight time of the object was about 30-40 seconds, but it was enough to clearly see what it looked like and what it was doing when passing by. in about 5 minutes later at the time of the sighting, at about 11:20pm, i noticed a jet flying at about the same altitude when the object was flying over the area earlier, but it was coming at north to south direction, and when it flew by its jet engines roared, which i then realized it was probably a military aircraft flying that low and fast, that is when i realized that the dark triangle object with 3 white lights did not make any kind of sound, and the jet flying by right afterwards was probably looking for the object.  my feelings at the time was shock, and a little more frightening after i quickly processed in my mind of what i had just seen.  it must have been close above where i was at because  i lost sighting once it passed over the house, because of the verticle structure of house. i have wathced ufo documentaries mentioning ufo's that were triangles, and the scenario that played out afterwards with the jet, and that looks like what happened.  after seeing this object it is amazing that i spotted it at that particular moment in time, when i was actively looking up at the stars trying to get some fresh air.
content.summary: At night , while looking up saw 3 white lights descend then curve towards los angeles,when passing above saw outlining of perfect black triangle going at very high speed., no sound emitting from it. 5 minutes later possible military jet flys by n to s dir

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were at the drive in (west wind drive in) watching a film. now, granted that's near an airport, i've lived near airports all my life. this was unlike anything i have ever seen before. there were about 12-15 little lights, pinhead sized if you were looking at them. they seemed to move in towards each other, and then away.. similar to an organized flock of birds. no sounds either, as there were no planes taking off. simply all that could be heard was the quiet sound of the movie. nothing you'd hear if it were a group of planes. i tried to point them out to my boyfriend, but by the time he actually looked to see, they had diapered to the northeast. i continued to watch the sky in hopes that i'd see them again, but nothing showed up that wasn't an airplane. i honestly thought that maybe it was a plane, but there were too many of them and they moved too much to be one. i was shocked after noticing them. i have never seen a ufo before, nor did i ever think i'd see one. i was irritated that my boyfriend didn't see them before they diapered. unfortunately, with it being dark in the car, and cluttered with the various blankets, pillows, popcorn, candy, etc, i couldn't find my phone fast enough to take video or even picture. not to mention, i didn't want to lose sight of them.
content.summary: Many little yellow lights moving quickly towards and away from each other

content.detailedDescription: I have talked to you guys before i don't think you guys can help me the rounb metal orb the size of a basket ball hit my buick olds mobile on my side of the door in the new mexico desert you had some one from new mexico right my e-mail but i lost that e-mail it happened in 1987 but it is really starting to bug me every day know plus the reptile being i saw i saw a show were you guyes went to the indian res in new mexico i need to talk to the shaw men of that trib they will know what i saw hit my car some one you guyes knows sombody knows i am getting closer to finding the truth the metal ball or orbe huvered like a dancer moving in and out of small desert shrubs i watched it for about a half hour it new i was watching it thats why it hit my car it new i saw it it had no sound it was like the wind i did some studing after exsperance ran in to magnetic frequincy removing mass i just need to talk to some one on the res please.
content.summary: Round metalic orb

content.detailedDescription: Driving home, after 2nd shift, i saw very large light hovering over or near muskegon michigan. i have driven that stretch 3000 times and that object did not belong there, too big and bright for a star. i pulled over and got out to look, and total time i saw it was maybe 3 minutes. then it shot out of sight into outerspace, incredible acceleration, no human body could survive that. i saw it go right out of our atmosphere, directly, no vectoring for escape trajectory that our craft need.
content.summary: Much larger then any light should be, did not belong there. very familiar with area. round.
